description: Performed research into in-context learning of world models for reinforcement learning.

Developed robotics simulations using MuJoCo simulation software and applied on-policy and off-policy reinforcement learning algorithms in order to master navigation and grasping tasks. [Click for video.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EjhcR-CealU)

role: Intern with Android Location and Context Team
description: Applied machine learning to battery optimization in Android devices.

Worked on applying policy-gradient algorithms and other reinforcement learning techniques to the problem of quadcopter navigation. Developed a system for running multiple headless Gazebo processes in parallel.

role: Intern with Siri Natural Language Team
description: Worked on machine learning techniques for deriving meaning from user utterances.

Led the intelligence section at a Marine Corps Logistics Battalion, mentoring the Marines who worked with me, developing new capabilities within the section, and planning battalion training in conjunction with adjacent sections.
